channel.title: Can someone plz tell me how to put in commands?
channel.description: I need to put in the divorce command on my server, could someone tell me how to that?

item.title: Can someone plz tell me how to put in commands?
item.dc:creator: @superhobo666 superhobo666
item.description:
@superhobo666 wrote:

Mupescape:

if you want items you type in “::item and item id” for example say you want d chain you type in ::item 3140 hit enter and it will appear on ground. to get other stuff like 999m d chain’s type in ::pickup 3141 999999999 the next number is usually the noted item.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 04:16:33 PM[/size][hr]and to use the bank type in ::bank and hit eneter

He was asking for how to add his own commands, or commands made by others, to his server, not how to spawn items or to get to his bank.

and, unfortunately, I do not know to do that as of yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone plz tell me how to put in commands?
